step.cmd: Insert installation CD into your computer CD drive.

An autorun window should appear on the screen. Select student module installation. In case the autorun window has not appeared, you will have to launch setup-nibelungclient.exe from the installation disk manually.
Dialog Nibelung Setup wizard window should appear on your screen ( ). Press the Next button.

End User License Agreement window should appear on your screen ( ). You must accept the License Agreement to proceed by checking I accept the terms of the License Agreement box, followed by pressing the Next button. You can cancel the installation at any time by pressing the Cancel button.
Student module setup window will appear on your screen ( ). You should enter IP address or domain name of the teacher workstation and the Student Seat ID.

info.p: Select the Launch program at Windows Start Up check box to automatically launch the student module upon each Windows start.

step.cmd: The next window on your screen will be the Setup Type selection window ( ).

info.p:
You can choose between:
Typical Installation - installs the most typical configuration that should suit most users
Custom Installation - you can select which Dialog Nibelung components to install
Full Installation - installs all the components.
info.note: Most users should select Typical Installation.

step.cmd: If you have selected Custom Installation, you will be able to choose components to install in the next window ( ).

info.note: Only select Custom Installation after you have had sufficient experience working with Dialog Nibelung.

step.cmd: After selecting installation type and pressing the Next button, you should see the Destination Folder window ( ) on your screen.

info.note: Default destination path is C:\Program Files\LAIN\Nibelung.
info.p: You can choose a different destination by pressing the Change button. Press Next after you have finished.

step.cmd: The next window on your screen informs you that everything is ready to start the installation ( ).

info.p: Press the Back button if you need to change installation parameters.
Press Cancel to abort the installation.
Press Install when you are ready to start the installation. ( ).

step.cmd: After the installation has successfully completed, Installation complete window will appear on your screen ( ). You can press the Finish button to exit Setup Wizard.

info.note: Please note that the Start Dialog Nibelung Student module will only appear in this window if the check box Launch program at Windows Start Up was selected earlier on.
info.p: Dialog Nibelung Setup Wizard will add a Nibelung menu item to your StartAll programs menu. The newly created Nibelung menu contains items to launch the software, remove it, and open the user manual in PDF format.
info.note: You can open the user manual using Adobe Acrobat Reader, which is included on the installation disk for your convenience.
info.p: An icon to launch the student module will also be placed on your desktop.

step.cmd: If the Setup Wizard is launched on a computer that already has Dialog Nibelung installed, the Change, repair or remove window ( )will appear on your screen. This window allows you to:

ul.li: Add or remove Dialog Nibelung components
Uninstall Dialog Nibelung from this computer.
